casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Qualo LOWERY. No. 425P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Barbara A. Shaw, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of August 2006 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

*186"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
